overview: Whether they are officers or new recruits, these lean masculine men and boys know what's expected of them, and they dare not say no. From room inspections gone wrong, spare time used freely or punishment from the top - it's a way of life for these military men. Just because you're pretty, you're not given an easy ride, it's usually a harder one! It's tough being in the armed push, but it's even tougher when you have to submit to your super hung superior.
tagline: Indulge your fetish for hot military men in and out of uniform!
title: Hard Corps
